TextView.android:text:
• Software update windows will now show download percentage 
• Detect and prompt user to seek support if task scheduler is incorrectly configured 
• Improve Steam auto-minimization 
• Automatically add the lab location when a ticket is submitted 
• Fix issue causing tablet responsiveness to slow down for the first minute after launching 
• Fix issue with keys not being used when a message decryption fails 
• Launcher no longer attempts to update when it is in offline mode 
• Removed a ‘server offline’ message from the launcher that would cause installed applications to be shown as not installed 
• Fix tablet sometimes caching current experience details when a station is restarted 
• Detect and automatically fix the launcher install path if it points to the wrong location 
• Some station statuses would not be triggered when run from a scene 
• Tablet would sometimes continually show ‘awaiting headset connection’ when that is not the current status 
• Help button was not present on the station page
More details of this update are available at https://lumination.com.au/product-updates
